data.text: Hiwa jarra, zaatlop nangni rathuulla Christa Jisu sik-ah mikhumna ah kaom Paul kei'n Pathian diang kani.
Hiwa Pathian riangwai nangni sik-ah thosik chuon keidiang inape kha nangni'n ningjetjei tia kei ka-ngamnajei.
Khachu imphuumma kaom Pathian lungdou kha malarra keidiang anaminjetjei, halli kei'n kabongnga kimajia kha ejei.
Hiwahi ningteel phakhan kei'n Christa diangnga inphuumma kaom kajet nakha nangni'n jetningte.
Apha matiangchu hiwa inphuumma kaomhi manmasi ngaidiang ileiminjet emak, takkha tuunchu Ratha-ah Pathian in ama tirton khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngaidiang iminjetkha ejei.

Inphuumma kaom khachu chongkahoi khan ajar eya Zaatlop ngaikha Israel ngaile bateii in-esuom, khat-um Pathian in Christa Jisu diangnga chong inkhitna kha inchansuomma taksa inkhatbit insuungkhur in ejei. Col 1:26,27
Ama ranakli chuontho nuoiya Pathian riangwai jarra inapeii kutchoi dungjuiya hiwa chongkahoi sik-ah kei suok ka-inchang.
Pathian ikadang mirakip karra aheknakhet ka-e innum, minkhidan kaboi inchongkhet Christa jarra zaatlop ngaidiang chongkaril sik-ah riangwai hichu keidiang inape kha eii,
Halli angrakip akabool Pathian diang akatheng khang rakip-ah alei inphuumma alei kaom, hiwa jarra mirakip diang inphuumma kaom kha angme tikha kaminthiar sik-um eii.
Ama imanuom khachu tuun koisuok diangnga inphut Pathian lungsing lungwar intei angjet kha marwaan ramma chuonkaroon waikaroon ngaidiang minjetnasik hi eii.
Hiwahi eini Pumi Christa Jisu diangnga inphut imintung hektik kaboi ama i-ngaidon dungjuiya itho kha eii.
Ama diangnga inphut khat-um amadiang ngamna jarra eini'n Pathian diang ngamna khat-um nilungdouwa luutmatorna nimu kha eii.
Kei'n nangni sikbit-ah kanapoongpi jarra nangni'n ningmalung minpoong maru; ajarchu nangni lurna sik eii.
Hiwa jarra kei'n Pa Pathian maikuungnga kemurkhup thep-ah chubei katho.
Ama makheiya marwaan khat-um nuoipil chungnga kaom insuungkhur rakip in inraming inroon.
Ama hektik kaboi lurna dungjuiya ama Ratha ah nangni suungnga ningratha ngarnasik kei'n Pathian diang kani.
Halli ngamna le inruoiya Christa in nangni malung suungnga omnasik khat-um inriang lamma arajung kasi khat-um kacheet-ah ningngir nasik-ah kei'n Pathian diang kananipi,
khachu Pathian mi ngai rakiple inruoiya nangni'n Christa minriangna kha adung akhang, insaang inthuuk jetnasik-ah ranak ningnei nasik,
khat-um jetna rakip neek-ah kakheel Christa minriangna kha ningjetnasik tichu Pathian sipna kha minkhidan omlekleiya nangni'n ningsipnasik kha eii.
Tuunchu eini nina emakli ni-ngaidon chungtiang ama ranak dungjuiya eini suungnga chuonkatho mator amadiang,
koisuok ah khat-um Christa Jisu diang khang rakip-ah hektik kaboiya kalur kalian kha erase! Amen.
